results.title: 天府-长篇纪实小说 [electronic resource]. 文晓愚.
abstracts: 《天府》是一部以中国当代社会为背景的纪实小说。小说以中国重庆市副市长叛逃美国驻成都总领事馆为切入点，以故事主角徐孝愚和刘庆国两人为主线，刻画了两人从童年到中年所经历的风风雨雨，并针对近八十年间，发生在中国大陆的一些重大事件进行梳理和阐述。小说对重庆副市长叛逃前后的重庆"唱红打黑"等一系列政治事件，有较为深刻的揭示。小说也以几名一同上山下乡的知青的人生经历，以及徐孝愚同司马浒姤恋爱又非婚生子的故事为副线，讲述了不同人物的学习、生活经历与各自的"三观"，比较真实地反映了当代中国的官场生活和正在形成的中产阶层面貌。小说最后以主、副线的重要人物聚会天府黄龙溪、新津宝墩文化、三星堆文化以及著名人物在天府的经历，作为上卷结束的点睛之笔。.

results.title: 食荒人 [electronic resource]. 小寒.
abstracts: 全球每年丢弃超过 13 亿吨的粮食。当中有好大的百分比的食物处于可食用的状态。越富裕、越发达的国家，情况越严重。暴殄天物如瘟疫一般，成为了消费者，还有餐饮业者的日常作息。丑的、边角料、体型不达标的、储存不当的、因生产过量导致售价暴跌的食材......全都沦为垃圾堆填区的一部分。   世界浪费这些食物的当儿，每天依然有超过 8 亿人挨饿，令人十分心痛。   将剩余食材、丑食和边角料转化为精致餐点的餐厅此时正在各个大城市悄悄地崛起，而这些尊重环境、减少浪费、无偏见的都是全世界最好的大厨。《食荒人》讲述的，正是这么一家专门将"垃圾"食物再循环成为美食的精品餐厅。书中通过讲述来自破碎家庭的餐饮业者从成长到成熟、成功的故事，来探讨、来反讽现代人对待食物、家庭、爱情和"价值"这两个字的态度。 【作者简介】曾荣获七届新加坡金曲奖最佳作词，也是第一位四度入围台湾金曲奖最佳作词的小寒，写过陈奕迅《孤独患者》、林俊杰《伟大的渺小》、林忆莲《纤维》、蔡依林《我》、蔡健雅《达尔文》、张惠妹《坏的好人》、曹格《寂寞先生》、洪佩瑜《踮起脚尖爱》等脍炙人口、触动人心的歌词。　　拥有病毒学博士学位的她在为流行乐坛写词之余，也为音乐剧如《老九》《聊斋》；电影如《881》《为你转身》；大型活动如推广华语运动、新加坡国庆、妆艺大游行等填词。 　　除了创作歌词，小寒也是一位特约作者，已为《联合晚报》与《新明日报》写了超过十五年的专栏。她的第一本图文并茂的小品散文集《眼泪是胶囊》于2011年初上架，并已再版四次。长篇小说《无指幸福》分别于新加坡（2013）、马来西亚（2014）与中国（2015）出版，还有奇幻励志小说《回不去的候车站》（2015）、得奖的生活励志小品《幸好我不是满分女生》（2017）都出自她的手，并已在中国出版。她为青少年编写的校园小说《穿校服的老师》于 2019 年底上架，续集《整人中学》也已经于 2021 年初出版。.

results.title: How the king of elfhame learned to hate stories [electronic resource]. Holly Black.
abstracts: Return to the captivating world of Elfhame with this illustrated addition to the  New York Times  bestselling Folk of Air trilogy that began with  The Cruel Prince , from award-winning author Holly Black.   Once upon a time, there was a boy with a wicked tongue.  Before Cardan was a cruel prince or a wicked king, he was a faerie child with a heart of stone. #1  New York Times  bestselling author, Holly Black reveals a deeper look into the dramatic life of Elfhame's enigmatic high king, Cardan. This tale includes delicious details of life before  The Cruel Prince,  an adventure beyond  The Queen of Nothing,  and familiar moments from The Folk of the Air trilogy, told wholly from Cardan's perspective. This new installment in the Folk of the Air series is a return to the heart-racing romance, danger, humor, and drama that enchanted readers everywhere. Each chapter is paired with lavish and luminous full-color art, making this the perfect collector's item to be enjoyed by both new audiences and old.

results.title: Classic love poems [electronic resource]. William Shakespeare.
abstracts: Of all the stimuli that have inspired poets over the centuries, love in all its guises has been an unceasingly rich and varied source of powerful, romantic and exquisite verse. Love poems have retained their popularity through the years by expressing eternal and universal emotions. From Chaucer to Coleridge, Shakespeare to Shelley, the same message of love has been put to verse in a myriad of poetic styles. Classic Love Poems contains a cross section of the true ‘classics’ of the genre, and constitutes a thorough representation of the enduring power of love over all humankind.    Poets in this anthology include: Blake, Byron, Chaucer, Coleridge, Donne, Keats, Marlowe, Marvell, Milton and many others.

results.title: The edgier waters [electronic resource] : 5 years of 3:am magazine. A Stevens.
abstracts: 3:AM Magazine is only five years old but it has already garnered much praise and become the natural home for writers whose work breaks boundaries and taboos. Assembled to celebrate this are a diverse collection of stories, poems and essays which have appeared in the magazine, from award-winning authors to lesser-known voices.

results.title: 世界很苦, 而你是草莓味 [electronic resource]. 嫚仔著.
abstracts: 本书是一本真实恋爱成长回忆录，讲述一个女孩挫折不断的成长和一个男孩的温柔守护，从校服到婚纱，爱情让彼此成为更好的人。书中选取日常生活中常见的场景发展出一些相映成趣的故事，其中掺杂了对生活、事业、成长正面积极的思考。.

results.title: 成语故事 [electronic resource]. 好孩子图书编辑部.
abstracts: 《影响孩子一生的成语故事》根据教育部制定的《全日制义务教育语文课程标准》，全面解释了上百个成语，是现在少有的配图、大容量成语类图书。所有的成语都用浅显易懂的语言和精美的图画再现出来，用最恰当的方式将中国几千年的优秀文化用短小的篇幅诙谐幽默地总结出来。.

results.title: 日本怪谈故事 [electronic resource]. 小泉八云等著.
abstracts: 落魄的武士为了攀附豪门，不惜与外人联手残害孕中的妻子，一尸两命。愤怒的亡魂归来复仇，然悲剧已经无法挽回。男子爱上了深夜提着灯笼的美艳女子，不料女子竟是幽灵所化。男子在屋里贴满驱鬼符纸，幽灵终日在屋外哭泣徘徊——原来，男子竟是她生前最爱的情郎。荒野从中传来诡异的声响，惊慌的旅人情急之下向住在附近的老妪求助。然而半夜老妪突然化为妖怪，旅人危在旦夕......这是一本苦涩又温暖的故事集，它包括日本各地流传的妖怪传说和怪谈，比如耳熟能详的四谷怪谈、琵琶法师、源平合战、凶宅幽灵等等。书里每一个人物皆有形有影，每一个故事都有血有肉，是日本传统文化的精髓所在。淡淡的恐怖，浓浓的民俗风情。三十多个妖怪传说，带你走进另一个日本。.

results.title: She will soar [electronic resource] : Bright, brave poems about freedom by women. Ana Sampson.
abstracts: A sister volume to  She is Fierce  this is a stunning gift book featuring 130 poems written by women.   With poems from classic, well loved poets as well as innovative and bold modern voices,  She Will Soar  is a stunning collection and an essential addition to any bookshelf. From the ancient world right up to the present day, it includes poems on wanderlust, travel, daydreams, flights of fancy, escaping into books, tranquillity, courage, hope and resilience. From frustrated housewives to passionate activists, from servants and suffragettes to some of today's most gifted writers, here is a bold choir of voices demanding independence and celebrating their hard-won power. Immerse yourself in poems by Carol Ann Duffy, Christina Rossetti, Stevie Smith, Sarah Crossan, Emily Dickinson, Salena Godden, Mary Jean Chan, Charly Cox, Nikita Gill, Fiona Benson, Hollie McNish and Grace Nichols to name but a few.

results.title: 死魂灵; 钦差大臣 [electronic resource]. 果戈里.
abstracts: 《死魂灵、钦差大臣》是俄国讽刺作家果戈里代表作的合集。《死魂灵》是"俄国文坛上划时代的巨著"，小说描写了一个投机钻营的骗子——六等文官乞乞科夫为了发财致富想出一套买空卖空、巧取豪夺的发财妙计，廉价收购在农奴花名册上尚未注销的死农奴，并以移民为借口，向国家申请无主荒地，然后再将得到的土地和死农奴名单一同抵押给政府，从中渔利。《钦差达成》描写了纨绔子弟赫莱斯达阔夫与人打赌输得精光，在一筹莫展之际，从彼得堡途径外省某市，被误认为"钦差大臣"，在当地官僚中引起恐慌，闹出许多笑话。《鼻子》《外套》展示了生活在专制制度下"小人物"的悲剧。《死魂灵钦差大臣》作者果戈里善于描绘生活，将现实和幻想结合，具有讽刺性的幽默，他最著名的作品就是《死魂灵》和《钦差大臣》。.

results.title: The best japanese short stories [electronic resource] : Works by 14 modern masters: kawabata, akutagawa and more. Lane Dunlop.
abstracts: An anthology of the greatest stories by modern Japanese masters (including previously overlooked women writers)!   Fourteen distinct voices are assembled in this one-of-a-kind anthology tracing a nation's changing social landscapes. Internationally renowned writers like Yasunari Kawabata, Ryunosuke Akutagawa and Junichi Watanabe are joined by three notable women writers whose works have not yet received sufficient attention—Kanoko Okamoto, Fumiko Hayashi and Yumiko Kurahashi.  Highlights of this anthology include:   Kafu Nagai's bittersweet portrait of a privileged family's expiring existence in "The Fox"  Ango Sakaguchi's heartening celebration of postwar chaos in "One Woman and the War"  Fumiko Hayashi's unabashed exploration of female sexuality in "Borneo Diamond"  Junichi Watanabe's chilling assessment of alienation and social dislocation in "Invitation to Suicide"  Gishu Nakayama's look at an out-of-place prostitute recovering at a hot-spring resort in "Autumn Wind"  Through brilliant, highly-praised translations by Lane Dunlop,  The Best Japanese Short Stories  offers fascinating glimpses of a society embracing change while holding tenaciously onto the past. A new foreword by Alan Tansman provides insightful back stories about the authors and the literary backdrop against which they created these great works of modern world literature.

results.title: Jane austen's little book of wisdom [electronic resource] : Words on love, life, society and literature. Andrea Kirk Assaf.
abstracts: Jane Austen's Little Book of Wisdom offers more than 300 bite-size quotes of inspiration and wisdom from one of the greatest females writer's in the English language. Jane Austen is one of the most celebrated female writers in history, best known for her novels about love, life, friendship and faith, all set upon the backdrop of English Georgian society. Here, in one concise volume, are over 300 quotes from her famous works – from Pride and Prejudice to Emma – and from her personal letters. With each chapter focussing on a different theme – from Love & Longing to Female Strength – this gorgeous gift book is the perfect compilation of witty, moving, and thought-provoking words from one of the best-loved writers of the 19th century. A perfect addition to this 'Little Book' series, Jane Austen's Little Book of Wisdom follows on from, C.S. Lewis's Little Book of Wisdom and Shakespeare's Little Book of Wisdom.

results.title: The narrow cage and other modern fairy tales [electronic resource]. Adam Kuplowsky.
abstracts: Vasily Eroshenko was one of the most remarkable transnational literary figures of the early twentieth century: a blind multilingual Esperantist from Ukraine who joined left-wing circles in Japan and befriended the famous modernist writer Lu Xun in China. Born in a small Ukrainian village in imperial Russia, he was blinded at a young age by complications from measles. Seeking to escape the limitations imposed on the blind, Eroshenko became a globe-trotting storyteller. He was well known in Japan and China as a social activist and a popular writer of political fairy tales that drew comparisons to Hans Christian Andersen and Oscar Wilde.  The Narrow Cage and Other Modern Fairy Tales  presents a selection of Eroshenko's stories, translated from Japanese and Esperanto, to English readers for the first time. These fables tell the stories of a religiously disillusioned fish, a jealous paper lantern, a scholarly young mouse, a captive tiger who seeks to liberate his fellow animals, and many more. They are at once inventive and politically charged experiments with the fairy tale genre and charming, lyrical stories that will captivate readers as much today as they did during Eroshenko's lifetime. In addition to eighteen fairy tales, the book includes semiautobiographical writings and prose poems that vividly evoke Eroshenko's life and world.

results.title: Why we read [electronic resource].
abstracts: Why read non-fiction? Is it just to find things out? Or is it for pleasure, challenge, adventure, meaning? Here, in seventy new pieces, some of the most original writers and thinkers of our time give their answers.  From Hilton Als on reading as writing's dearest companion to Nicci Gerrard on reading for her life; from Malcolm Gladwell on entering the minds of others to Michael Lewis on books as secret discoveries; and from Lea Ypi on the search for freedom to Slavoj Žižek on violent readings, each offers their own surprising perspective on the simple act of turning a page. The result is a celebration of seeing the world in new ways - and of having our minds changed.

results.title: The metamorphosis and other stories [electronic resource]. Franz Kafka.
abstracts: Gregor Samsa hates his job. He works himself to exhaustion as a traveling salesman to support a family that takes him for granted. One morning, his whole life changes. He wakes up to discover that he has turned into a giant insect. As he and his family come to grips with the fantastical event,  The Metamorphosis  explores themes of alienation, family loyalty, and unconditional love.

results.title: Daodejing [electronic resource]. Laozi.
abstracts: A transformative new edition of Taoism's central text that overturns its reputation for calming, gnomic wisdom, revealing instead a work of "philosophical dynamite."    Grounded in a lifetime of research and interpretive work and informed by careful study of recent archeological discoveries of alternate versions of the text, Brook Ziporyn, one of the preeminent explicators of Eastern religions in English, brings us a revelatory new translation—and a radical reinterpretation—of the central text of Taoist thought. Ziporyn offers an alternative to the overly comforting tone of so many translations, revealing instead the electrifying strangeness and explosively unsettling philosophical implications of this famously ambiguous work. In Ziporyn's hands, this is no mere "wisdom book" of anodyne affirmations or mildly diverting brain-teasers—this pathbreaking Daodejing will forever change how the text is read and understood in the West.

results.title: The written world and the unwritten world [electronic resource] : Essays. Italo Calvino.
abstracts: "Wonderful... Calvino's prose is sparkling as ever, and he approaches ideas with wit and an open mind, always ready to challenge a stale point of view. This anthology will delight Calvino fans old and new."  — Publishers Weekly    A rich collection of essays offering an extraordinary global view of Calvino's approach to writing, reading, and interpreting literature.   An extraordinary collection of essays, forewords, articles, and interviews, The Written World and the Unwritten World displays the remarkable intelligence and razor-sharp wit of prolific Italian writer Italo Calvino as he explores the meaning of literature in a rapidly changing world. From classics to contemporary literature, from tradition to the avant-garde, Calvino masterfully explores reading, writing, and translating through careful and illuminating discussion of the works of Bakhtin, Brecht, Cortázar, Thomas Mann, Octavio Paz, Georges Perec, Salman Rushdie, Gore Vidal, and more. Drawn from Mondo scritto e mondo non scritto (2002), Sulla fiaba (1988), and other uncollected essays, this volume of previously untranslated work—now rendered in English by acclaimed translator Ann Goldstein—is a major statement in literary criticism.

results.title: 晓玲叮当魔法童话 (美绘注音版) [electronic resource]. 晓玲叮当.
abstracts: 世界上真的有魔法吗? 当然。它就在我们的心灵深处。晓玲叮当用她满心的善意和关怀，营造令小读者着迷、感动的童话世界，每篇童话里，都藏着一个神奇的魔法。这魔法中包含作家对话自然草木鸟兽的感悟和洞见，蕴藏着弥足珍贵的人生经验和处世智慧。书中童话富于童心、童趣和童情，犹如遥远而美丽的传说，给小读者带来深切的感动，引发关于梦想、信念、善恶、美丑的思考，体现作家对自信、坚持、友爱、谦虚等传统美德的弘扬，和对塑造小读者美好心灵、健康人格的初心，故事里的魔法，会给孩子们带来奇迹般的变化。.

results.title: 蛋蛋超人 [electronic resource]. 许诺晨.
abstracts: 本书收入诺米姐姐《蛋蛋超人》《水果王国》《小猪呆呆》3篇代表童话：每个小朋友都幻想过成为超人，蛋蛋超人从"超人界的反面教材"蜕变为名副其实的超级英雄的故事，让小朋友们懂得，拥有善良、正义感和行动力，才是超人的秘密武器。水果小朋友们突发奇想，建起水果王宫还要轮流当国王。奇葩国王们为赢得最佳国王的称呼，使出了浑身解数。发生在水果王国里的故事让小朋友们懂得，比起冠军，更要紧的是健康、快乐、谦虚有爱心。呆呆是世界上最最胆小害羞又沉默的小猪，但当给孤单的熊奶奶送去陪伴和温暖，靠"坚持坚持再坚持"带领小伙伴赢得拔河冠军，风雨无阻帮小兔完成心愿，呆呆又成了小朋友们眼中最最聪明勇敢善良的小猪。小猪呆呆的故事让小朋友们懂得，拥有宝贵的爱心，惊喜和好运就会来敲门！.

results.title: 小巫女艾玛 [electronic resource]. 许诺晨.
abstracts: 本书收入诺米姐姐《小女巫艾玛》《小狐狸洛卡》《小鱼安安》3篇代表童话：聪明聪明真聪明，小狐狸洛卡代号叫"智多星"！上百只猴子兵临城下，大老虎伸出魔爪，森林保卫战一触即发，他都能想出应对的办法。小狐狸洛卡的故事，帮助小朋友大开脑筋，面对困难积极坚韧，同时懂得关爱家人，爱护环境。 小女巫艾玛酷爱制造魔法事件：棕红色的卷发剪掉多少长出多少，成为喷火龙"笨蛋"的主人，和"笨蛋"一起捉弄扑克人......而她制造过最成功的"魔法事件"当然是，凭着猫头鹰邮差的羊皮纸信，凭着水晶球和魔法地图的帮助，救出船长爸爸，打败不可一世的大怪鱼。走近小女巫艾玛的魔法世界，小朋友会像艾玛一样获得奇思妙想，也像艾玛一样懂得用勇气和行动去呵护家人。 小鱼安安终于如愿以偿，可以看到翡翠湖外面是什么样。外面的世界很精彩，可也让他迷失方向，只要鲜花和掌声，忘记了好朋友和大海的呼声。故事最后，小鱼安安终于回到翡翠湖，并决定向着自己真正的梦想迈进。走进小鱼安安和小伙伴的世界，小朋友会懂得疼痛才能换来美丽和成长，懂得将梦想的船桨紧握在手中，不在半路返航。.

results.title: 巴金作品精选 [electronic resource]. 巴金.
abstracts: 《巴金作品精选》收录了《憩园》《鸟的天堂》《怀念萧珊》等作品，展示这位百岁老人不同人生阶段的所思所感和生活踪迹。从这些至情至性的文字中我们看到巴金的欢乐与忧愁，挫折与追求，以及他对这个世界深沉的爱与思索。.

results.title: 好喜欢的中国寓言故事 [electronic resource]. 少军.
abstracts: 本书精选了孩子易于理解、有教育意义的寓言故事一百余篇，插图精美，选文精当，内容长度适中，便于小学生识读，对开发儿童智力、塑造儿童品格、培养儿童良好的阅读习惯和帮助学生积累作文素材，都会起到良好的促进作用。.

results.title: 蜗牛星球的来信 [electronic resource]. 朵朵飞.
abstracts: 《蜗牛星球上的来信》一书收录短篇童话故事30余篇，通过主人公海盗贼贼在太空中旅行，邂逅千奇百怪的不同星球的经历，描绘了发生在各个星球上的有趣故事。本书构思精巧，以绮丽丰富的想象力，将宇宙的磅礴精彩与童稚的纯真可爱结合起来，天马行空，妙趣横生。同时，每个星球故事相对独立，分别展现爱与成长，友情与善良，团结与互助等与孩子的生活息息相关的积极主题，让孩子在阅读生动有趣的故事的同时，潜移默化中得到爱的滋养，塑造优秀品格。.

results.title: The diaries of franz kafka [electronic resource]. Franz Kafka.
abstracts: An essential new translation of the author’s complete, uncensored diaries—a revelation of the idiosyncrasies and rough edges of one of the twentieth century’s most influential writers. “An invaluable addition to Kafka’s oeuvre.”— The New York Times   Dating from 1909 to 1923, the handwritten diaries contain various kinds of writing: accounts of daily events, reflections, observations, literary sketches, drafts of letters, accounts of dreams, as well as finished stories. This volume makes available for the first time in English a comprehensive reconstruction of the diary entries and provides substantial new content, including details, names, literary works, and passages of a sexual nature that were omitted from previous publications. By faithfully reproducing the diaries’ distinctive—and often surprisingly unpolished—writing in Kafka’s notebooks, translator Ross Benjamin brings to light not only the author’s use of the diaries for literary experimentation and private self-expression, but also their value as a work of art in themselves.

results.title: 好喜欢的中国历史故事 [electronic resource]. 袁野.
abstracts: 本书以时间为轴，精选了二十四篇经典历史内容，以故事的形式向孩子们展现了中国上下五千年的历史概况，同时搭配了精美的彩色插图，让历史读起来更轻松，更有趣，从而激起孩子们的学习兴趣和他们自主探究历史的欲望。.

results.title: 冰车上的风差 [electronic resource]. 颜海婧.
abstracts: 成长路上的孤独和迷茫，最终都会被爱与陪伴填满。本书辑录了颜海婧创作的12篇短篇童话，包括《冰车上的风差》《云上的吉尔达》《给莫桑先生的信》《美味旅行箱》《老丁的火车》《第297页童话》等。每一篇都围绕一个主题，从勇气、爱、善良、友情、亲情等方面讲述一个个动人的故事，语言流畅优美，想象独特宽广，温暖动人。这些童话故事着力描绘少年成长阶段内心世界的青涩与孤独，向所有处在这一阶段的迷茫少年展开了一幅温暖、缱绻的成长画卷。也许世界的模样不似少年们所想象的那样完美，也许有太多的未知横亘在前行的道路上，但总有同行的伙伴不期而至，携起少年的手，一起度过这一段青涩的成长历程。.

results.title: 好喜欢的中国成语故事 [electronic resource]. 姜伯铭.
abstracts: 本书挑选了上百个我们耳熟能详的成语词汇。我们将成语以讲故事的形式呈现出来，在每个成语故事之后，还有点拨性的释义，方便学生对成语的理解和记忆。为增加故事的可读性和趣味性，每个成语故事还搭配了画风精美的插图，通过图文并茂的方式让学生们对成语有更加直观的认识。.

results.title: 小兔乖乖 [electronic resource]. 许诺晨.
abstracts: 本书收入诺米姐姐《小兔乖乖》《妈妈，我爱你》《毛毛，飞吧》3篇代表童话：考试发挥失常、又被妈妈揭穿"小秘密"的毛小小恼羞成怒，希望再也不要见到妈妈。小神仙答应帮她实现愿望，报酬是八个故事，毛小小开始了她的故事大发现......愿望就要实现了，毛小小却改变了主意。走进毛小小的故事，小朋友也会懂得换位思考，体谅家人，大声对妈妈说一句："我爱你！" 毛毛终于变成了蝴蝶！蜕变的过程中，爸爸妈妈帮他摆脱自卑，树立信心；萤火虫、南风、彩虹和蜗牛旅行家，让他获得鼓舞和力量；最难以忘怀的是月季花，曾经温暖陪伴，却天各一方，彼此想念。走进故事，小朋友会懂得像毛毛一样坚强面对成长必须经历的疼痛，也会倍加珍惜身边的好朋友。小兔乖乖勇敢正义还有一副热心肠，调皮的兔拉风搞恶作剧，乖乖"以毒攻毒"，让兔拉风有苦说不出，但当兔拉风遇到危险，乖乖却又不计前嫌，拼命救助。读过故事，小朋友也会像乖乖一样宽容、善意地对待小伙伴，每天像向日葵见到太阳一样开心，大朋友们也会收获激发"小神兽"创意和上进心的秘籍。.

results.title: 好喜欢的中国民间故事 [electronic resource]. 少军.
abstracts: 本书选摘了二十一个脍炙人口的中国民间故事，用适合孩子阅读的语言进行讲述，内容生动、积极向上。每个故事还搭配了精美的插图，图文并茂，帮助孩子们理解故事内容，提高阅读兴趣。具有很强的针对性和功能性。.
